bug.author: madanadit
bug.summary: EMR script does not work in all regions
bug.description: Alluxio Version: 2.0.1 Describe the bug Launch an EMT cluster in region us-west-1, the hostname fqdn is <>..us-west-1.compute.internal which breaks our EMR script which assumes <>.ec2.internal To Reproduce ^ Expected behavior N/A Urgency Medium Additional context N/A

comments.comment: I wish AWS didn't have these silly exceptions for different regions... <denchmark-link:https://docs.aws.amazon.com/vpc/latest/userguide/VPC_DHCP_Options.html>https://docs.aws.amazon.com/vpc/latest/userguide/VPC_DHCP_Options.html</denchmark-link>
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/ZacBlanco>@ZacBlanco</denchmark-link> what is the status on this?
